definition: to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently

sentences.english: Breast stuck his bottom at the same time, it will certainly be accompanied by facial fullness.
sentences.chinese: 丰乳翘臀的同时，一定会随同这面部的丰满。

sentences.english: He goes with Kohane to get glasses.
Antelopes are born well developed and are soon able to run with herd.
sentences.chinese: 羚羊出生时就发育健全，很快便能随同羚羊群奔跑。

sentences.english: Observers can accompany the audit team but do not act as part of it.
sentences.chinese: 观察员可以随同审核组，但不作为其成员。

sentences.english: The happy behind has the pressure concomitance.
sentences.chinese: 开心的背后有压力的随同。

sentences.english: When users sign messages, their certificates are added along with the signature.
sentences.chinese: 当用户签署报文时，证明随同签名一起被加了进去。

sentences.english: The text was lost when jerusalem was lost in 1187 .
sentences.chinese: 1187年其版本随同耶路撒冷的失守而丢失。

sentences.english: Saladin, at age 26, went along with them.
sentences.chinese: 时年26岁的萨拉丁也随同前往。

sentences.english: Maybe, along with China's space industry failure so many.
sentences.chinese: 也许，随同中国航天事业的失败很多很多。

sentences.english: Xiao Zhang has gone to accompany a delegation on a visit abroad.
sentences.chinese: 小张随同代表团出国访问去了。

sentences.english: This package gets loaded at run time along with the application to be monitored.
sentences.chinese: 这个包在运行时随同要监视的应用程序一起进行加载。

sentences.english: J. started nursery school, Sue went with him as a helper.
sentences.chinese: 上幼儿园的时候，苏作为看护也随同前往。

sentences.english: One day a King rode into the forest. His son was with him.
sentences.chinese: 一天，一位国王骑马进了森林，王子也随同他前往。

definition: to guard/to protect/bodyguard (for officials in ancient times)
to receive orders/to follow orders/to act under orders
to send under escort/to transport a detainee
to meet/to rendezvous/to merge/to link up/meeting/confluence
